content: If anyone needs assistance testing or help location scripts for their tracks please contact Touchstone_Support@aegis.net and we'll be happy to help.
can we just use this stream? seems easier than email...
Lee - yes, you can. We do monitor Zulip, but if you need something quickly, I can recommend email. Thanks!
thanks carie, the team has been very responsive both over email and when "called in" on the tracks i've joined. kudos!
